<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Octopus Bottle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1952)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Expandable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=475" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 57 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Miniature [octopus](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=143) arms press up against the sides of this bottle, obscuring the rest of its contents. When opened, a Huge octopus bursts forth, which can appear in water instead of on the ground. Its arms attempt to grasp a creature with a reach of 15 feet. The octopus repositions that creature to a different space within its reach unless the target succeeds at a DC 24 Fortitude save.

 If the octopus is in water, it then releases a cloud of ink in a 30-foot emanation. This cloud has no effect outside of water. Creatures inside the cloud are [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) and can't use their sense of smell. The cloud dissipates after 1 minute.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a [giant octopus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=315) corpse.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Octopus Bottle
